title: Redmi Note 14's international launch is coming soon
description: The Redmi Note 14 got official in China in September, and we've been waiting for its international debut ever since. Now it turns out we might not have a lot of waiting left to do. That's because the international version of the Redmi Note 14 has just been certified for sale outside of China. Specifically, in Indonesia, where it passed through SDPPI with the model number 24094RAD4G. The "G" at the end there reveals the fact that this is indeed the global variant. This certification hasn't confirmed any specs, but there was really no need for that as the phone is already official in...
excerpt: The phone has been certified for sale outside of China. The Redmi Note 14 got official in China in September, and we've been waiting for its international...
text: The Redmi Note 14 got official in China in September, and we've been waiting for its international debut ever since. Now it turns out we might not have a lot of waiting left to do. That's because the international version of the Redmi Note 14 has just been certified for sale outside of China. Specifically, in Indonesia, where it passed through SDPPI with the model number 24094RAD4G. The "G" at the end there reveals the fact that this is indeed the global variant. This certification hasn't confirmed any specs, but there was really no need for that as the phone is already official in China. It comes with a 6.67-inch 1080x2400 120 Hz OLED touchscreen with 2,100-nit peak brightness, the Dimensity 7025 Ultra chipset, 6/8/12GB of RAM, 128/256GB of storage, a 50 MP main camera with OIS, a 2 MP macro shooter, a 16 MP selfie snapper, and a 5,110 mAh battery with support for 45W wired charging. Via
html:
The Redmi Note 14 got official in China in September, and we've been waiting for its international debut ever since. Now it turns out we might not have a lot of waiting left to do.

That's because the international version of the Redmi Note 14 has just been certified for sale outside of China. Specifically, in Indonesia, where it passed through SDPPI with the model number 24094RAD4G. The "G" at the end there reveals the fact that this is indeed the global variant.

This certification hasn't confirmed any specs, but there was really no need for that as the phone is already official in China. It comes with a 6.67-inch 1080x2400 120 Hz OLED touchscreen with 2,100-nit peak brightness, the Dimensity 7025 Ultra chipset, 6/8/12GB of RAM, 128/256GB of storage, a 50 MP main camera with OIS, a 2 MP macro shooter, a 16 MP selfie snapper, and a 5,110 mAh battery with support for 45W wired charging.

Via
